group_1.narration: The selfish princess thus@fell from the tower and died.@The End

Nothing good would happen to anyone,@regardless of whether they're good or bad.@But no matter what terrible events occurred,@the tragedy could be wrapped up@with the two words, "The End".

group_1.textLeft: Why don't you just grant your own wish?
